--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill looked stunned at the strange behavior, but remembered his
> original offer. "You got it sir." he said. He knelt down on his 
hands
> and knees, and then various parts of his body folded around,
> transforming, until he was in police car mode. He then opened his 
trunk
> up, as the seats inside folded down, to provide enough room for the
> seeker to lie down.

::REDHOT::

    Figuring a ride was better than wasting precious energy, Redhot 
eagerly crawled into Firedrill and snuggled down for a well deserved 
rest. He was careful not to injure himself, or Firedrill. Redhot 
didn't feel it was the most comfortable spot he'd ever been in, but 
concidering the situation, he didn't complain. It wasn't long before 
the sounds of a snoozing seeker rose into the air.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
